text:
"Lucas" is a 1986 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by David Seltzer, It was released on March 28, 1986. The movie was a geared toward a teen audience. This movie ranked number 16 on Entertainment Weekly's list of the [http://www.ew.com/ew/report/0,6115,1532588_1_0_,00.html 50 Best High School Movies].
Plot summary.
The main character of the movie "Lucas" is a shy and quiet, fourteen year old nerd, who is in love with a girl. This leads to heartbreak when his older friend and the girl fall in love.
